root.name: Chibi Robo: Park Patrol
root.description: StoryThe game starts out showing the business Citrusoft delivering Chibi-Robos all over the world to different parks. Chibi Robo was created to help turn barren lands into beautiful parks by watering flowers and thus its adventure begins - but there is a lurking evil that wants the park dirty. Conflict is inevitable.TriviaIt's the only Chibi-Robo! game since the original GameCube title to be released in the west.It was brought only to North America and Australia. No European version was released.The game was a Wal-Mart exclusive in North America.
